abstract: Pairing Shakespeare's sonnet LXXIII with a City Room blog post and an interactive photograph.
snippet: Pairing Shakespeare's sonnet LXXIII with a City Room blog post and an interactive photograph.
lead_paragraph: We're delighted to feature William Shakespeare today for the first time in our Poetry Pairing series.

headline.main: Poetry Pairing | 'That Time of Year Thou Mayst in Me Behold'
